about_the_game:
【 Game play 】

Mainly inspired by cozy and idle games, we abandoned Unity and used Godot to make the game for the first time in order to make it more suitable for low-end computers.

The game process is estimated to be 200 to 500 hours, and if the player likes it, consider updating more content.

【 Background 】

The game still uses the world view of the game, but as before, you can easily immerse yourself in it even if you haven't played any of the games in the series.

The plot should not be compared with history, after all, we can travel through the multiverse, as black jokes and humor.

If you see what the plot will smile, then it is a full affirmation of our, in short, I hope players can play the game happily.

【 Author's words 】

This game did a demo slice in 2022, in the form of simulated management + placement, but there has been no time to improve it.

Originally this scheme has been abandoned, at this time a friend thought the game setting is quite interesting, decided to help us do it, and this game was born.

After 3 years after the new folder, it is really not easy to see the light of day, thanks to the great help of friends.

name: Songs of Yummy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD Graphics 3000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Songs of Yummy is a cozy and idle game. Food is scarce in the army, and you play Jia Xu and Cheng Yu, ordered to prepare for our army supplies. You will use every means to make everything in the world into military food.
